Title: Captain America: Civil War
Plot: With many people fearing the actions of super heroes, the government decides to push for the Hero Registration Act, a law that limits a hero's actions. This results in a division in The Avengers. Iron Man stands with this Act, claiming that their actions must be kept in check otherwise cities will continue to be destroyed, but Captain America feels that saving the world is daring enough and that they cannot rely on the government to protect the world. This escalates into an all-out war between Team Iron Man (Iron Man, Black Panther, Vision, Black Widow, War Machine, and Spider-Man) and Team Captain America (Captain America, Bucky Barnes, Falcon, Scarlet Witch, Hawkeye, and Ant Man) while a new villain emerges.
Writers: Christopher Markus, Stephen McFeely, Joe Simon, Jack Kirby, Mark Millar, Steven McNiven
Stars: Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr., Scarlett Johansson, Sebastian Stan
Companies: Marvel Studios, Vita-Ray Dutch Productions (III), Studio Babelsberg
Languages: English, German, Xhosa, Russian, Romanian, Hindi
Keywords: marvel cinematic universe,based on comic book,superhero,siberia,friendship between men

Similars.Title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
Similars.Plot: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.
Similars.Stars: Chris Evans, Samuel L. Jackson, Scarlett Johansson

Similars.Title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
Similars.Plot: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's mightiest heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plan.
Similars.Stars: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo

Similars.Title: Thor: Ragnarok
Similars.Plot: Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.
Similars.Stars: Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston, Cate Blanchett

Similars.Title: Marvel Studios' Captain America: the First Avenger
Similars.FullTitle: Marvel Studios' Captain America: the First Avenger (2011)
Similars.Plot: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier, transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a "Super-Soldier serum". But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a war monger and a terrorist organization.
Similars.Stars: Chris Evans, Hugo Weaving, Samuel L. Jackson

Similars.Title: The Avengers
Similars.Plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
Similars.Stars: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson

Similars.Title: Ant-Man
Similars.Plot: Armed with a super-suit with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.
Similars.Stars: Paul Rudd, Michael Douglas, Corey Stoll

Similars.Title: Doctor Strange
Similars.Plot: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.
Similars.Stars: Benedict Cumberbatch, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Rachel McAdams

Similars.Title: Black Panther
Similars.Plot: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.
Similars.Stars: Chadwick Boseman, Michael B. Jordan, Lupita Nyong'o

Similars.Title: Avengers: Infinity War
Similars.Plot: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.
Similars.Stars: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo

Similars.Title: Guardians of the Galaxy
Similars.Plot: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.
Similars.Stars: Chris Pratt, Vin Diesel, Bradley Cooper

Similars.Title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
Similars.Plot: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.
Similars.Stars: Tom Holland, Michael Keaton, Robert Downey Jr.

Similars.Title: Iron Man
Similars.Plot: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.
Similars.Stars: Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Terrence Howard
